section.title: Other &ns;::client->name_request()s
section.para: &ns;::getdir_request(), &ns;::subscribe_request() and &ns;::subscribeserverstatus_request() follow the same design as other asynchronous requests, like &ns;::get_request() and &ns;::put_request(), and implement the asynchronous versions of their synchronous cousins; and can be used, in the same way, with &ns;::process_request().
